description: Creates a usage limit for a specified Amazon Redshift feature on a cluster. The usage limit is identified by the returned usage limit identifier.

parameters.name: ClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the cluster that you want to limit usage.

parameters.name: FeatureType
parameters.description: The Amazon Redshift feature that you want to limit.

parameters.name: LimitType
parameters.description: The type of limit. Depending on the feature type, this can be based on a time duration or data size. If FeatureType is spectrum, then LimitType must be data-scanned. If FeatureType is concurrency-scaling, then LimitType must be time. If FeatureType is cross-region-datasharing, then LimitType must be data-scanned.

parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description: The limit amount. If time-based, this amount is in minutes. If data-based, this amount is in terabytes (TB). The value must be a positive number.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag instances. (dict) --- A tag consisting of a name/value pair for a resource. Key (string) --- The key, or name, for the resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: UsageLimitId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the usage limit.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster with a usage limit.

nested_items.name: FeatureType
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift feature to which the limit applies.

nested_items.name: LimitType
nested_items.description: The type of limit. Depending on the feature type, this can be based on a time duration or data size.

nested_items.name: Amount
nested_items.description: The limit amount. If time-based, this amount is in minutes. If data-based, this amount is in terabytes (TB).

nested_items.name: Period
nested_items.description: The time period that the amount applies to. A weekly period begins on Sunday. The default is monthly.

nested_items.name: BreachAction
nested_items.description: The action that Amazon Redshift takes when the limit is reached. Possible values are:

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.
